title: 820-00840 Data does not work on USB-C
message:
Good afternoon, this mac was not working HDMI, I performed U2800 and it worked again. Now the customer returns with the defect of not reading data from SSD/HD 2.0/3.0. 
   I performed the replacement of the two cd3215 but did not solve it.

title: 820-00840 Data does not work on USB-C
message: Do you get 5V on USB devices?

title: 820-00840 Data does not work on USB-C
message: Yes, the external USB led stays on.

title: 820-00840 Data does not work on USB-C
message: Possibly bad USB redriver chip, PI3USB32224BXEAE...

title: 820-00840 Data does not work on USB-C
message: Can you tell me which other board I can remove this component from?

title: 820-00840 Data does not work on USB-C
message:
Usually works without it; at least USB 2.0.
Remove the chip and test with various device, like mouse, pendrive...

title: 820-00840 Data does not work on USB-C
message:
USB 2.0 works.
I put another one in, but USB 3.0 doesn't work.

title: 820-00840 Data does not work on USB-C
message: Try another chip; be sure to solder it correctly.

title: 820-00840 Data does not work on USB-C
message: I soldered a new chip, but usb-c 3.0 doesn't work. Is there another component that also does this management?

title: 820-00840 Data does not work on USB-C
message:
Check diode mode to ground on all USB3 data lines.
Compare with good board, if possible.
There should be some series capacitors to check also.

title: 820-00840 Data does not work on USB-C
820-00840 Data does not work on USB-C
message: I wrote "USB3" just because it appears as is in their names...
